directions: Combine psyllium husk, tapioca flour, arrowroot, coconut flour, baking powder, salt, and onion powder in the bowl of a food processor; blend until well combined. Add hot water and olive oil; blend until a soft dough is formed. Divide dough into 6 equal parts. Roll out each ball to a 5-inch disc between two sheets of parchment paper.

Heat a 6-inch iron skillet over medium-high heat and grease with cooking spray. Place wrap on the hot skillet for just 5 seconds; flip it immediately with a spatula, and cook until lightly golden, about 40 seconds. Flip and cook for another 40 seconds.
ingredients: ¼ cup hot water, or more as needed
title: Egg-Free Gluten-Free Keto Wraps
